fields.label: Spreadsheet ID
fields.description: Copy the ID from your Google Sheets URL (the part between /d/ and /edit). Example: 1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J

fields.label: Sheet Name
fields.description: Name of the tab inside the spreadsheet (e.g., Sheet1, Data, etc.)

fields.label: Row Numbers to Delete
fields.description: Enter row numbers to delete. You can specify single rows (e.g., '5'), ranges (e.g., '5-10'), or multiple rows (e.g., '5,7,10-12'). Separate multiple entries with commas.

fields.label: Confirm Deletion
fields.description: Check this box to confirm that you want to delete the specified rows. This action cannot be undone.
